general.title: Community Transformation
general.description: Through your generous support, we've been able to serve over 500 families this year with food assistance, counseling, and spiritual guidance.

general.title: Lives Changed
general.description: Your partnership has enabled us to witness 150 baptisms and countless testimonies of transformed lives through our ministry programs.

youth.title: Next Generation Impact
youth.description: Our youth ministry has grown to 200+ active participants, with 85% reporting stronger faith and better life choices through our mentorship programs.

youth.title: Youth Leadership Development
youth.description: Thanks to your support, 45 young people have completed our leadership training program and are now serving in various ministry capacities.

seniors.title: Senior Care Ministry
seniors.description: Our senior ministry has provided companionship, meals, and spiritual care to over 300 elderly members of our community this year.

seniors.title: Wisdom Keepers Program
seniors.description: Through your generosity, we've connected 100+ seniors with younger families, creating meaningful intergenerational relationships.

outreach.title: Community Outreach
outreach.description: Your donations have enabled us to distribute 10,000 meals, provide clothing to 500 families, and offer free medical clinics to underserved communities.

missions.title: Global Missions Impact
missions.description: Through your faithful giving, we've supported 12 missionary families and established 3 new churches in underserved regions around the world.
